result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andre Tyrone Williams

records.addlTxt: 10:26 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Aaron M. Damrau and Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in court for Andre Tyrone Williams. Defendant Andre Tyrone Williams in court. Includes 20CF468, 20CM575 and 22cf496. Court reviews case. Atty Damrau states there is not a resolution at this time. Court reviews Witness lists. Witness lists are final at this time. Court reviews states motions. Attys Respond. Court grants motions. Court reviews DE's motions. Attys respond. Court reserves on motion as to what is presented at trail. ADA Ballo notes amended information filed. Atty Perrin to file letter if there is an objection. Court allows alternate juror. 5 strikes. Adjourned 11:06 AM
filed by Travis Satorius; hereby appointing Atty Perrin. arc
Status conference on September 20, 2022 at 10:30 am.

* AMENDED *
INCLUDES 20CF468 and 22CF496
- BOND ON FILE

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, V.N.S., Celina S., C.A.B., R.J.B. or their residence or places of employment (Family Fresh or Speedway in New Richmond WI).  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.   The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

3:31 PM 3:20 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: K. Anderson, Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo and Aaron Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in court for Andre Tyrone Williams. Defendant Andre Tyrone Williams in court. INCLUDES 20CF468 (MH), 20CM575 (STC) and 22CF496 (INIT). 22CF496: DE received complaint. Atty. Perrin notes that she has not been assigned to this case. State requests bond. Atty. Perrin makes bond argument. Prelim time limits waived. Court sets bond. DE states that he is currently living at Regency Inn, Hudson WI. DE updates address. 20CF468: Counsel arguments. Court denies State's motion. Atty. Perrin intends to file motion. Atty. Perrin to file objection no later than 9/2 regarding State's expert testimony. Atty. Perrin states that she has a possible DNA expert, to provide notice to the State no later than 9/2. Adjourned: 4:25 PM. kma
